overview:
MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_:) FunctionMACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_:)iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+func MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_ domain: MACaptionAppearanceDomain) -> Bool Parameters domainPreference domain, see  @link MACaptionAppearanceDomain @/link.

A boolean indicating if the currently-active style has been customized by the user

Provides a boolean indicating if the currently-active style has been customized by the user. This is useful for some clients who may need different fallback strategies for customized styles vs system-default styles.

# MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Media Accessibility ](/documentation/mediaaccessibility)

- [ MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_:) ](/documentation/MediaAccessibility/MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_:))

-  MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_:) 

Function# MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+

```
func MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_ domain: MACaptionAppearanceDomain) -> Bool
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/MediaAccessibility/MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_:)#parameters)

`domain`Preference domain, see @link MACaptionAppearanceDomain @/link.

## [Return Value](/documentation/MediaAccessibility/MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_:)#return-value)

A boolean indicating if the currently-active style has been customized by the user

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaAccessibility/MACaptionAppearanceIsCustomized(_:)#discussion)

Provides a boolean indicating if the currently-active style has been customized by the user. This is useful for some clients who may need different fallback strategies for customized styles vs system-default styles.
